events.title: Annual Tech Conference
events.description: A conference about the latest in technology, innovation, and digital trends.

events.title: SolFest
events.description: SolFest is East Africa's premier music festival, dedicated to celebrating and promoting African musical talent on a global stage. Founded on the principles of discipline, order, passion, and excellence, SolFest has become a significant cultural event in East Africa, attracting thousands of attendees each year.
